job_history.work_description: Opened new customer accounts, including checking, savings and lines of credit. Balanced daily cash deposits and bank vault inventory with a zero error rate. Processed cash withdrawals. Researched and resolved customer issues on personal savings, checking and lines of credit accounts. Delivered prompt, accurate and excellent customer service. Researched banking guidelines and statutory requirements to stay updated on new laws and applications.
